cookie-consent.message: Myskoolin uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

landing.title: The online school life management system
landing.subtitle:
First ever complete school life management system with IA school tables generation and e-learning module.
As a student or school manager, use it all your life !
landing.subtitle-2: Multiple interfaces : School manager, schooling office, teachers, infirmary, parents and students.

login.signin-failed-tips: Please check your credentials and try again.

success.resetPwd: Request made. We sent a password reset message to the email address you specified.

error.authentication: Authentication error. Please enter a valid username and password.

resetPwd.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please contact support {{contactPhone}}.

reset-finish.title: Resetting your password
reset-finish.error: Your password could not be reset. This may be due to the expiration date, which is 24 hours.
reset-finish.key-is-missing: An error occured : The reset key is missing. Veuillez resend a password reset request.
reset-finish.success: Your password has been reset. Please login.

item1.title: your school management needs
item1.content: Administration, schooling office, teachers, infirmary, parents and students.

item2.title: to use
item2.content: Interactive menu. Real time notifications. Custom interface.

item3.title: ergonomics
item3.content: Each interface is adapted to the user type.

item4.title: plateform
item4.content: Compatible with PCs, tablets and smartphones.

services.title: For all the school management needs
services.content: Myskoolin contains an interface per user type. Interfaces for all college or high school needs.

features-list.item1:
Several interfaces available
Administration, schooling office, infirmary, teachers, students, parents...

administration.title: Administration
administration.content: Management of all school needs : school rooms, staff, plannings, parents, students, schooling...

school-office.title: Schooling office
school-office.content: Automated time tables generation, classes management and monitoring, student absences, delays, penalties, notes and class councils...

teachers.title: Teachers
teachers.content: Declaration of absences, sanctions and infirmary passages. Management assignments, exams and class councils...

infirmary.title: Infirmary
infirmary.content: Records of infirmary passages. Personalized student records and projects of student schooling...

parents.title: Student Responsibles
parents.content: One account for all student schooling.

students.title: Students
students.content: Custom time table, homework, exams, bulletins, class councils...

subscribe.title: Subscription
subscribe.content: Subscription to one of the above formulas

configure.title: Configuration
configure.content:
Add students, school classes...
Time tables generation...

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.content: Sign up to receive our news by email.
newsletter.email-error: Your e-mail is required and must be valid.

messages.ok: Thank you for your registration. You will receive shortly a confirmation email.
messages.ko: An error occurred during newsletter registration.

contact.title: Contact form

form.name: Name
form.name-error: Your name is required and must be at least 2 characters.
form.email-error: Your e-mail is required and must be valid.
form.email-confirmation: Thank you. You have been subscribed to the newsletter.
form.school-name-error: Your school name is required and must be at least 2 characters.
form.address-error: Your address is required and must be valid.
form.contact-reason-error: Please select the reason you contact us.

contact.contact-confirmation: Thank you for your request. It has been sent and will be processed as soon as possible.

support.title: Help
support.content: Our customers have can contact the customer service in case of system malfunction or missing information on the website. In addition, each interface (schooling office, teachers, administration ...) has a help section.
